__e: Look, we have been shot at, betrayed, and you have definitely had one too many at the bar.
But he felt betrayed, and so he stranded me here, and only years later did I discover where he'd been.
Alden is a traitor, and he is in love with a witch.
So why should I trust you? As you've already betrayed me.
Well, yeah, I didn't really think you'd show up, considering you had so recently double-crossed me.
There is nothing more painful than feeling betrayed by someone you love so deeply.
I know what it is to be alone, to have been betrayed by the one person you thought you could trust.
I don't know if he meant he never lost his faith or he felt betrayed by it.
Now he betrayed you, by choosing to save your daughter, instead of you.
If she has deceived you, she could lead them here.
I made what I could on the side, but I never turned on you, Frank!
And he believed that, until he realised that even you had betrayed him.
I feel like I betrayed him, too.
All I know is that I feel like I betrayed him.
You and your family have betrayed us!
Ye've just... ye've betrayed us, you know? Ye have. All of us.
And whatever it was we used to believe in has just... Betrayed us all.
